title: Data-Driven Decision Making
description: This course covers the principles of data-driven decision making. It includes topics such as data analysis techniques, statistical methods, and decision-making frameworks.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning techniques, model evaluation, and practical applications.

title: Advanced Web Development
description: This advanced course covers topics such as responsive design, server-side scripting, and web application security. It is designed for experienced web developers looking to enhance their skills.

title: Introduction to Data Science
description: This course provides an introduction to data science, including data visualization, data wrangling, and data storytelling. It is designed for beginners with no prior experience in data science.

title: Mobile App Development
description: This course covers the principles of mobile app development, including user interface design, data storage, and app deployment. It is designed for beginners with no prior experience in app development.
